dialogue.start: Listen, I really shouldn't be telling you this, but I'm kind of a big deal. Too big in fact that I had to move down here from the mainland. Now, they might tell you otherwise on why I moved down here but that doesn't matter. I owe Marlo a favor or two. Now, can you take this package down to the camp up north and deliver it to Marlo".
dialogue.active: I Hope you don't plan on keeping that package for yourself any longer.
dialogue.completed: They what?! Well, at least you took care of them before they took care of me. Here, it's only fair I gave you some coin for your troubles. If anyone asks you what happened to those men, don't mention me.
dialogue.r_completed: Who are you?! Where is Solomon?! Nevermind we'll get him after we're done with you. Men! Attack!
